claims.object: process by which a chemical or physical signal is transmitted through a cell as a series of molecular events
series of molecular events inside a cell
converts an external signal into a specific cellular response

surface_layer.definition: The process by which a chemical or physical signal is transmitted through a cell as a series of molecular events.

deep_layer.mechanism: Signals move through the cell by passing from protein to protein, each protein modifying the next in some way.

epistemic_metadata.source: Signal transduction - Wikipedia, The Inside Story of Cell Communication - University of Utah, Signal Transduction Pathway - Definition, Types, Functions, Examples
